title: Literacy Integration Learning Design Workshop: Microlearning Application in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course where entry-level professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields experience creative instructional design by utilizing game-based learning tools and digital reading tools in mobile environments to enhance mathematical literacy

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more mathematics microlearning scenarios integrating literacy skills (reading, interpretation, and analysis).
Learners can propose specific collaborative learning strategies using game-based learning tools and digital reading tools.
Learners can systematically present plans to improve mathematical literacy aligned with project-based assessment criteria.

resources: Mobile Game-Based Learning App (e.g., Math Puzzle Game)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
